Plot: A prep school student needing money agrees to "babysit" a blind man, but the job is not at all what he anticipated.
Title: Scent of a Woman
Writer: Giovanni Arpino (novel), Bo Goldman (screenplay), Ruggero Maccari (character from Profumo Di Donna), Dino Risi (character from Profumo Di Donna)
Actors: Al Pacino, Chris O'Donnell, James Rebhorn, Gabrielle Anwar
tomatoConsensus: It might soar on Al Pacino's performance more than the drama itself, but what a performance it is -- big, bold, occasionally over-the-top, and finally giving the Academy pause to award the star his first Oscar.
